cz.muni.fi.virtualtoolmanager.pubapi.entities

Class PortRule.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.muni.fi.virtualtoolmanager.pubapi.entities.PortRule.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    PortRule

    public static class PortRule.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a key part of so called Builder pattern. Static class Builder is used only for more transparent, easier and faster set up of PortRule attributes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder(java.lang.String ruleName, int hostPort, int guestPort)
      The first and the only constructor in which are set up the key port rule values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PortRule build()
      Creates new port rule with values of attributes set up by Builder class.
      PortRule.Builder guestIP(java.lang.String value)
      Sets the static IP address of the virtual machine.
      PortRule.Builder hostIP(java.lang.String value)
      Sets the IP address of the host machine.
      PortRule.Builder protocol(ProtocolType value)
      Sets the type of protocol used for traffic.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder(java.lang.String ruleName,
               int hostPort,
               int guestPort)
        The first and the only constructor in which are set up the key port rule values.
        Parameters:
        ruleName - name of the rule, must be unique on the destination virtual machine
        hostPort - port number used on host machine
        guestPort - port number used on virtual machine

    • Method Detail

      • protocol

        public PortRule.Builder protocol(ProtocolType value)
        Sets the type of protocol used for traffic.
        Parameters:
        value - type of protocol used for port rule
        Returns:
        instance of actual Builder class for more compact and dynamic building class

        Parameters:

        public PortRule.Builder guestIP(java.lang.String value)
        Sets the static IP address of the virtual machine.
        Parameters:
        value - static IP address of the virtual machine
        Returns:
        instance of actual Builder class for more compact and dynamic building class

      • build

        public PortRule build()
        Creates new port rule with values of attributes set up by Builder class.
        Returns:
        new port rule
